original_text: And if he have betrothed her unto his son, he shall deal with her after the manner of daughters.
korean_text: 만일 그를 자기 아들에게 주기로 하였으면 그를 딸 같이 대우할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And if he have betrothed her unto his son
he shall deal with her after the manner of daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 딸들에게 하듯이 그녀를 대할 것이다
